mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT question_seq, title, reg_dt, reg_usr, mod_dt, mod_usr FROM tb_question WHERE 1=1
AND title LIKE '%'||#{KEYWORD}||'%'
ORDER BY question_seq DESC ) A ) A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.RNUM > (#{PAGE} - 1) * #{PAGESIZE} AND A.RNUM <= #{PAGE} * #{PAGESIZE}

SELECT question_seq, title, reg_dt, reg_usr, mod_dt, mod_usr, con_question, con_io, con_example, con_condition, con_hint, con_etc FROM tb_question WHERE question_seq = cast(#{question_seq} as integer)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_question ( question_seq, title, reg_dt, reg_usr, mod_dt, mod_usr, con_question, con_io, con_example, con_condition, con_hint, con_etc ) VALUES ( nextval('sq_tb_question'), #{title}, now(), #{reg_usr}, now(), #{mod_usr}, #{con_question}, #{con_io}, #{con_example}, #{con_condition}, #{con_hint}, #{con_etc} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_question SET title = #{title}, con_question = #{con_question}, con_io = #{con_io}, con_example = #{con_example}, con_condition = #{con_condition}, con_hint = #{con_hint}, con_etc = #{con_etc}, mod_usr = #{mod_usr}, mod_dt = now() WHERE question_seq = cast(#{question_seq} as integer)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_question WHERE 1 = 1 AND question_seq = CAST(#{question_seq} as integer)
